title: S&T Bancorp, Inc. (NASDAQ:STBA) Price Target Update
text:
S&T Bancorp, Inc. (NASDAQ:STBA) Price Target Update September 24, 2015 by Andrew Milberg in Market Indices Â· 0 Comment 
S&T Bancorp, Inc. (NASDAQ:STBA) should head towards $31.67 per share according to 3 Analysts in consensus. However, if the road gets shaky, the stock may fall short to $31 per share. The higher price estimate target is at $32 according to the Analysts. 
S&T Bancorp, Inc. (NASDAQ:STBA) has received a hold rating for the short term, according to the latest rank of 3 from research firm, Zacks. The company received an average rating of 2.8 from 5 analysts. 1 analysts recommended buying the shares. 4 analysts have rated the company at hold. 
Many analysts have commented on the company rating. Keefe Bruyette & Woods maintains its rating on S&T Bancorp, Inc. (NASDAQ:STBA). The global brokerage major raises the current price target from $31 per share to $33 per share. Analysts at the Keefe Bruyette & Woods have a current rating of Outperform on the shares. The rating by the firm was issued on July 22, 2015. 
S&T Bancorp, Inc. (NASDAQ:STBA) rose 1.4% or 0.44 points on Wednesday and made its way into the gainers of the day. After trading began at $31.51 the stock was seen hitting $32.03 as a peak level and $31.33 as the lowest level. The stock ended up at $31.93. The daily volume was measured at 101,266 shares. The 52-week high of the share price is $32.88 and the 52-week low is $23.07. The company has a market cap of $1,112 million. 
On a different note, The Company has disclosed insider buying and selling activities to the Securities Exchange, The Securities and Exchange Commission has divulged that Gibson James Thomas, director of S&T Bancorp Inc, had unloaded 25,000 shares at an average price of $31.3 in a transaction dated on July 24, 2015. The total value of the transaction was worth $782,500. 
Shares of S&T Bancorp Inc. rose by 0.73% in the last five trading days and 10.98% for the last 4 weeks. S&T Bancorp Inc. is up 7.31% in the last 3-month period. Year-to-Date the stock performance stands at 9.16%. 
S&T Bancorp, Inc. (S&T) is a bank holding company and has three wholly owned subsidiaries, S&T Bank, 9th Street Holdings, Inc. and STBA Capital Trust I. The Company also owns certain interest in Commonwealth Trust Credit Life Insurance Company. As of December 31, 2012, the Company had approximately $3.4 billion in loans and $3.6 billion in deposits. S&T Bank is a full service bank. It provides its services to its customers through offices located in Allegheny, Armstrong, Blair, Butler, Cambria, Clarion, Clearfield, Indiana, Jefferson and Westmoreland counties of Pennsylvania. It operates in three segments: Community Banking, Wealth Management and Insurance. Its Community Banking segment offers services, which include accepting time and demand deposit accounts, originating commercial and consumer loans, and providing letters of credit and credit card services. The Wealth Management segment offers discount brokerage services, services as executor and trustee under wills and deeds.
